About

This is the Bootstrap Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com

You can find the source code for the Jekyll theme at github.com/llorephie/jekyll-bootstrap

You can find the source code for Jekyll at github.com/jekyll/jekyll

Welcome to tony's blog 自由軟體愛好者~喜歡不斷的思考各種問題，有新的事物都會想去學習嘗試 做實驗並熱衷研究 沒有所謂頂天的技術 只有謙虛及不斷的學習 精進專業，本站主要以分享系統及網路相關知識、資源而建立。
